content: this is a step by step written pattern for the sneak a peek top this is not the physical product if you are interesting in getting the top itself please check out my website passioknitgoods com the pattern includes sizes xs-xxl there are two versions of the pattern a long detailed version with photos for every step along the way then there is a short version with simplified typed instructions and no photos non refundable you may sell finished items from this pattern but you must credit me as the designer and use your own photos
